name: The Canine Clan
description:
The Ruins are no place for a family. This clan needs help to make it to the other side.

Control a family of four canines - Wolf, Dog, Fox and Puppy - as they navigate the Ruins.

Each canine has their own special abilities, but it is only by working together that can they make their way through.

Art - marram (environment) & nem (characters)

Programming - fox
